attributes.action: Do not change school exam timetable to suit Ramadan.
attributes.background: I  have a child in full time education and I  feel changing exam timetables to suit 8.1% of those in full time education is unfair and is also wrong to cater to any religion, especially one that isn't widely accepted as the religion of the host country (Christianity )

rejection.details:
Decisions about the dates of exams are taken by exam boards, not by the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may be interested in this recent statement made by the Joint Council for Qualifications, which is a membership organisation comprising the seven largest providers of qualifications in the UK:

http://www.jcq.org.uk/media-centre/news-releases/jcq-statement---exam-timetables
